org.resthub.core.context.config.persistence

Class AbstractEntitesParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.context.annotation.ComponentScanBeanDefinitionParser
      • org.resthub.core.context.config.AbstractParser
        • org.resthub.core.context.config.persistence.AbstractEntitesParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResthubBeanDefinitionParser, org.springframework.beans.factory.xml.BeanDefinitionParser
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExcludeEntitiesParser, IncludeEntitiesParser

    public abstract class AbstractEntitesParser
extends AbstractParser
    This class provide utilities for entities scanning defined by a scanning configuration in application context. Define an abstract handling method to manipulate all found entities, matching with specified configuration options. Concrete implementations should be provided

      • getPersistenceUnitName

        protected String getPersistenceUnitName(Element element)
        Determines in which persistence unit name entities should be added. This can be specified as a configuration option. If not, default persistence unit name is used
        Parameters:
        element - configuration element
        Returns:
        the persistence unit name
